bibl.title: Letter from Henry Rose Carter, Jr., to Laura Eugenia Hook Carter, March 30, 1910

div1.p: Carter, Jr., reports that he has been reassigned to Ancon hospital.

div1.head: Letter from Henry Rose Carter, Jr., to Laura Eugenia Hook Carter, March 30, 1910
div1.p:
Well I'm back in Ancon
hospital again. Dr Mac
Murdo wanted to get
on the Line to study
for the Army Examination
and so I was sent into
Ancon Hospital to take
his place while he went
to Bas Obispo

I am back on the Surgical
Side. I am glad to again
be in Hospital more so
as I thought I would not
get back again. It certainly
was nice to see how
sorry Dr Caldwell and the
others were to see me leave
the Line Caldwell said
that I was one of the
very best men he had ever
had with him while on the
Line. I certainly had a pleasent
time on the Line and its put me
in fine physical shape, now that
I am back at Ancon I can't tell
when I will be up on Vacation
as one has the time assigned
here and can not take their leaves
when one wants it. But its
certainly good to get back
to hospital work again. You
must excuse the time I've taken
to write but its taken some
time to get back and straighten
out in my new quarters

The boys here were delighted to
see me again and gave me
the “glad hand” on my return in
great shape

Tell Laura the scetch I
sent her was mearly
the rough plot of a
story I wanted her to
write as the plot is
good and I think she
could make a good
story of it I expect Papa
is back by this time
and that he has bought
Edward home with
him. It must be
a satisfaction to have them
at home once more. I trust
that Papa was much
improved by his stay at
Johns Hopkins and that
he and all of you are well
Laura wrote that you
had been sick. Ere now
I trust that you are well
again. Well by the next
letter I hope to be able
to let you know when
I will be up on vacation
I certainly look foward to the time
I'll be at home as then we will
again all be togeather and this time
I'll be in good health and able to
enjoy all of my time at home.
All of the people here ask that
I send love when I write
most of all the Herricks.

Well good bye and keep well
I will write more next time
with love
div1.closer:
I am your son Henry Address
H R Carter Jr
Ancon Hospital
Ancon
Canal Zone
P. S.
Ask Papa to write to Caldwell and thank
him for the way he treated me while
at Bas Obispo H R C
